content: स्पृश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (स्पृशति, पस्पर्श, अस्पृक्षत्-अस्पार्क्षीत्-अस्प्राक्षीत्, स्प्रक्ष्यति-स्पर्क्ष्यति, स्पर्ष्टुंस्प्रष्टुं, स्पृष्ट) {@--1@} To touch; स्पृशन्नपि गजो हति <ls>H. 3. 14</ls>; कर्णे परं स्पृशति हंति परं समूलं <ls>Pt. 1. 304.</ls> {@--2@} To lay the hand on, stroke gently with, touch; हस्तेन पस्पर्श तदंगमिंद्रः <ls>Ku. 3. 22.</ls> {@--3@} To adhere or cling to, come in contact with. {@--4@} To wash or sprinkle with water; <ls>Ms. 2. 60.</ls> {@--5@} To go to, reach; <ls>Ś. 2. 14</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 43.</ls> {@--6@} To attain to, obtain, reach a particular state; महोक्षतां वत्सतरः स्पृशन्निव <ls>R. 3. 32</ls>; विनाप्यर्थैर्वीरः स्पृशति बहुमानोन्नतिपदं <ls>H. 1. 175.</ls> {@--7@} To act upon, influence, affect, move, touch; <ls>Mu. 7. 16</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 95.</ls> {@--8@} To refer or allude to. {@--9@} To take, receive, accept (as a sacrificial offering). {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} To be polluted, defiled, or tainted; <ls>U. 1. 48.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (स्पर्शयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to touch. {@--2@} To give, present; गाः कोटिशः स्पर्शयता घटोध्नीः <ls>R. 2. 49.</ls>
स्पृश् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Who or what touches, touching, affecting, piercing; मर्मस्पृश्, हृदिस्पृश् &c.
